login.bottom: The login is required to access PaperLive's services and to securely manage your account.

register.errorPasswordFormat: The password must have at least 8 characters, one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one digit, and one special character. Please try again.
register.errorPasswordConf: The passwords do not match. Please try again.
register.bottom: By creating an account, you agree to the terms of service. For more information about PaperLive's privacy practices, see the privacy statement.

home.noDesc: You don't have a description yet, edit your profile to add one. This will allow other teams to better know what you do and what field you are in.

contribution.title: Title
contribution.noRelated: No contributions are linked to this contribution

contribution.suppCaption: Once deleted, there will be no way to undo this action and retrieve any information related to this contribution. Are you sure you want to delete this contribution from PaperLive?
contribution.deleteContWarning1: The contribution is about to be delete of your account, there will be no way to get it back, please be aware of what you are doing!
contribution.deleteContWarning2: To confirm the deletion of this contribution, please enter below the title of the contribution:

profile.deleteAccountWarning1: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.
profile.deleteAccountWarning3: We will immediately delete all of your contributions, along with all of your soumissions, stats and private information. You will no longer exist to anyone including you on PaperLive. Fill thoses input to confirm the permanent deletion of your account
profile.verificationPrompt: To verify, please type "DELETE MY ACCOUNT" in the input below:
profile.verificationError: Invalid verification. Please type "DELETE MY ACCOUNT" correctly to proceed with the account deletion.

security.changePasswordConfirmationCaption: Are you sure you want to change your password?
security.passwordError: Please provide the correct old password and try again.

about.par1: PaperLive is a scientific contribution lifecycle tracking platform dedicated to simplifying and enhancing the process of submission, review, and publication of scientific articles. Our goal is to provide a user-friendly and efficient platform for researchers and authors worldwide.
about.par2: We are the developers of PaperLive, Téo VILLET and Gabriel HALUS. With our passion for technology and our experience in web development, we have worked diligently under the guidance of Mr. Alain Tchana to design and create this innovative platform.
about.par3: The PaperLive application was developed within the Laboratoire d'Informatique de Grenoble (LIG), an internationally renowned institution in the field of computer science research. The LIG consists of passionate researchers and experts who work on various aspects of computer science, including the development of innovative applications to support scientific research. Through our collaboration with the LIG, we were able to benefit from additional resources and expertise to design and build PaperLive, ensuring that it meets industry standards and best practices. We are proud of this successful partnership and grateful to the LIG for their support throughout the development of PaperLive.
about.par4: If you have any questions, suggestions, or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us:
about.par5: We are delighted to support you in your experience with PaperLive, and we are committed to providing you with quality assistance for all your concerns.
